entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -17.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 12:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -17.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
